entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
